attributes.action: Take back control of your Brexit choice from Parliament, request a peoples poll.
attributes.additional_details:
You may have thought you had been lied to from the respective campaigns
You may now think you had insufficient information to make an informed decision
You may have changed your mind now & the voting demographics have now changed
You may not have had the opportunity to vote
You the opportunity to tell the PM what you now want from Brexit, so she may just pay attention and really deliver of the will of the people
attributes.background: Whether you voted Leave/Remain, the PM is not listening.  The referendum results were so close, the country is split and PM is convinced she is delivering the will of the people, as a brexiteer you may have wanted a no deal, hard/soft Brexit, as a remainer you may just want to stay or accept a deal

rejection.details:
We understand that you want a "people's poll" but we aren't sure exactly what options you would like people to vote on.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the vote to cover.
